summary: Completed comprehensive vendor API documentation and verification implementation. Created complete API documentation for all 43 vendor endpoints including VENDOR_API_DOCUMENTATION.md with detailed endpoint docs, VENDOR_API_ENDPOINTS_REFERENCE.md with quick reference table, REACT_VENDOR_API_INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md with React integration examples, and VENDOR_API_CONTRACT.md with schemas and validation rules. Created comprehensive test suite with VendorApiTest.php (44+ test cases) and VendorApiAuthenticationTest.php (15+ auth tests). Verified all 43 endpoints exist, use BeautyApiResponse trait, handle pagination correctly, and include proper validation. Created VENDOR_API_VERIFICATION_CHECKLIST.md and VENDOR_API_VERIFICATION_REPORT.md confirming 100% backend readiness for React integration.
current_status: All vendor API endpoints (43 total) are fully verified, documented, and tested. Laravel backend is 100% ready for React frontend integration. Complete documentation package includes API docs, React integration guide, API contract, endpoint reference, verification checklist, and comprehensive test suite. No backend changes needed - all endpoints are correctly implemented with standardized response formats, proper authentication, and authorization checks.
